scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross, bleeding from his wounds. To the left, the Virgin Mary, clad in a blue mantle, stands with hands clasped in prayer, accompanied by another female figure. To the right, a group of soldiers are present, one holding a banner with an eagle emblem, and another offering a sponge on a reed. In the background, a city with towers and buildings is visible, set against a hilly landscape under a sky with a sunburst and a crescent moon. The entire scene is framed by an arched architectural element with decorative motifs.
